<img src = "me.png" width = 130 alt = "Photo of Martin Papenberg">

Hi! I am Martin Papenberg, working as a post-doc researcher at the the 
department of [Psychological Assessment and Differential 
Psychology](http://www.psychologie.hhu.de/en/research-teams/psychological-assessment-and-differential-psychology/arbeitsgruppe.html) 
at [Heinrich Heine University 
Düsseldorf](https://www.uni-duesseldorf.de/home/en/home.html). I am 
interested in measurement, personality[^diss] and programming.[^R]

I am currently working on the `R` package 
[`anticlust`](https://github.com/m-Py/anticlust) that enables 
the automatic selection of stimuli for psychological experiments. Check 
out my [preprint](https://psyarxiv.com/3razc/) on the anticlustering method 
or [this vignette](https://m-py.github.io/anticlust/articles/stimulus-selection.html) illustrating how to use the `anticlust` package for stimulus 
selection in experiments. If you have any questions regarding the 
`anticlust` package, feel free to <a href = 
"mailto:martin.papenberg@hhu.de?subject=Help with the anticlust 
package">send me an email</a>.
